column4: that video card is buggy with 3D. You should stay away from fancy effects.
my computer isn't very fast to begin with...1MB cache, 521 MB mem, 60 GB 1.5 Ghz CPU...I wouldn't try that.
I figured. Most S3 integrated graphics card are in low-end laptops.
yeah. I'm trying to get a new one. But as we all know, that takes some time. :P.
